a, b, k = map(int, input().split())

while k > 0:
    if a > 0:
        a -= 1
    elif b > 0:
        b -= 1
    k -= 1

print(a, b)


# Read input
a, b, k = map(int, input().split())  # Read input

# Compute
if a >= k:  # If a is greater than k
    a -= k  # subtract k from a
else:  # If a is less than k
    k -= a  # subtract a from k
    a = 0  # set a to 0
    if b >= k:  # if b is greater than k
        b -= k  # subtract k from b
    else:
        b = 0

# Print output
print(a, b)

# Read input
a, b, k = map(int, input().split())

# Compute
if a >= k:
    a -= k
else:
    k -= a
    a = 0
    if b >= k:
        b -= k
    else:
        b = 0

# Print output
print(a, b)

a, b, k = map(int, input().split())

while k > 0:

        a -= 1
    elif b > 0:
        b -= 1
    k -= 1
print(a, b)
